name: Lynk
description:
Lynk is a puzzle game with a unique free drawing mechanic

- 130 handcrafted levels, no filler
- Clean minimalistic design
- No text, discover the game rules as you play
- No ads, no in-app purchases

History
Been developing mobile games for as long as I can remember, even on Windows Mobile and Windows CE devices. Worked in the game industry, did some freelance, now I'm back creating indie games. For this project I wanted to create something unique by combining game design elements that were already out there. Connecting two dots with a freely drawn line was the core mechanic, and from there it was expanded into a diverse set of levels. I hope you enjoy it :)

Location
Toronto, Canada

Price
September 6th 2017, $0.99
